episodes.title: Episode 15 - FLDS CULT: Warren Jeffs and Carolyn Jessops Story
episodes.description:
Kyla and Becca discuss the FLDS Cult in this episode. The FLDS - Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saint - is what Mormonism used to be. They will discuss Warren Jeffs and the story of Carolyn Jessop - who escaped from Merril Jessop. Merril Jessop was a high-ranking Bishop within the FLDS Church. Kyla will bring up some of the wives of Warren Jeffs as they discuss his transformation into a deeply disturbing Cult leader. 

These topics are for discussion purposes only. Viewer discretion is advised as they discuss topics of dark and disturbing nature. Physical violence is never the answer. If you are in an unsafe relationship, resources are available - https://www.thehotline.org is where you can speak with someone confidentially. 

For questions, feedback, Collaborations, and other inquiries - please contact chadderboxcorner@gmail.com
